DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_While in defensive stance, gain the ability to deflect incoming projectile spells. When a project is reflected, the effect continues for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. You may not reflect spells again for <Duration>[1] seconds</>.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: While in defensive stance, gain the ability to deflect incoming projectile spells. When a projectile is reflected, the effect continues for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. You may not reflect spells again for <Duration>[1] seconds</>.
